item.title: God of War Ragnarok Dataminer Seemingly Finds Link to Next Game
item.content:encoded:
A dataminer has seemingly found links to the next game in the series in the God of War: Ragnarok files, which mention Athena and an Egyptian cat.

Since the announcement of the God of War Trilogy Remake and the insider talks about Santa Monica’s other game, fans have been eagerly waiting for the next announcement. Many think it will be God of War in Egypt; however, we haven’t received confirmation for that yet. Now, some details about the next God of War game have surfaced online.

God of War Ragnarok Sequel Appears to Have References to Athena and Egypt

A new post on the r/GodofWarRagnarok subreddit discusses the datamine related to the next game. It seems this user found hidden content in God of War 2018 that turned out to be the beginning of Ragnarok (Atreus killing the bear, finding Tyr). Now, the user has found hidden content in Ragnarok’s files that could be part of the next game.

The datamined content includes a cutscene featuring Athena discussing Atreus and Odin. The Greek Goddess of Wisdom is apparently also referenced as the ‘Robed One’ in this cutscene. Athena’s dialogues are “To lefkó fídi tha se fáei,” which is Greek for “The white snake will eat you,” and “One failed us. One rejected us,” probably referencing Odin failing the ones from the higher plane and Atreus rejecting the mask.

There’s also a cutscene for Atreus, where he talks to a character called ‘Mau’. Mau is also a cat in Egyptian, and “one of the manifestations of the Sun God Ra.” The Mau character is like Groot from the MCU: he only says ‘I am Groot’. Mau only says ‘mau’, but Atreus seems to understand what he means. Check out the conversations below:

Athena Cutscene:

  • Robed Figure: “To lefkó fídi tha se fáei.”
  • Robed Figure: “One failed us. One rejected us.”
  • Athena: “We have a problem.”

Atreus and Mau Cutscene:

  • Atreus: “Wake up. I think we’re close.”
  • Mau: “Mau?“
  • Atreus: “Hey, you insisted on coming along. C’mon, let’s have a look.”
  • Mau: “Mau.”
  • Atreus: “I hope you’re right. Sounds like we found it.”

Readers should take this information with a grain of salt and wait for official confirmation from Santa Monica to know for sure.

In other news, the God of War Trilogy Remake features a new ‘fighting system‘. Additionally, the Kratos actor has stated that we will hear more about what Santa Monica is doing late summer. What are your thoughts on the datamined details for God of War Ragnarok’s sequel? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Capcom promising to take firm action over Resident Evil Requiem leaks. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Hurricane Map Condition In ARC Raiders Shrouded Sky, Explained
item.content:encoded:
Shrouded Sky is bringing a lot of new content to ARC Raiders, but one of the highlights is undoubtedly the Hurricane map Condition. These are a key part of what keeps ARC Raiders feeling fresh and exciting, as some of them can fundamentally change how a map is played.

Some of the Map Conditions can be minor, like Bird City, but it seems like the Hurricanes are set to make some big changes when they roll through the maps. If you’re wondering what’s on the way with the Hurricanes, as well as what ARC Raiders maps they’re playable on, then you’re in the right place.

What Maps Are Hurricanes On In ARC Raiders?

As things stand, it hasn’t been officially announced which maps the new Hurricane Map Condition will be playable on, but the teaser trailer provides a few clues.

During the trailer, the iconic Spaceport tower is clearly visible, indicating that the Hurricane will be playable on that map, but the rest of the footage is notably dark and unclear. Whilst that might replicate the visibility issues during the Hurricane, it makes it harder to figure out what maps are being played on.

  • More Insider Gaming: ARC Raiders Shrouded Sky Release Date & Start Times—All Content, Explained

However, from what little can be seen, it appears that Dam Battlegrounds will be another playable map that features the new Map Condition, and maybe even The Blue Gate. They seem to be safe guesses, as both maps feature prominent overground areas, and a Hurricane hitting Buried City might be thematically inappropriate, whilst Stella Montis would simply be unfeasible.

Once Embark Studios officially reveals which maps the Hurricane Map Condition will be playable on, Insider Gaming will be sure to update this article with more certain clarity.

What Changes Will The Hurricane Map Condition Make In ARC Raiders?

The Hurricane Map Condition will make numerous changes to ARC Raiders, with the key ones being impacted visibility and flying debris that can damage shields.

  • More Insider Gaming: ARC Raiders Event Tracker—Every Map Condition Schedule

Here’s every change coming to ARC Raiders during the Hurricane Map Condition:

Wind

Perhaps the most prominent feature of the Hurricane Map Condition is that raiders will have to battle unrelenting winds as they explore topside. They’re not just for show, however, as they’ll directly hinder movement and the trajectory of thrown items like grenades. Even smoke, gas, and jumping will be impacted by the Hurricane, so it’s important to plan your movements carefully.

Debris

The winds don’t just impact raiders, though, as they’ll also kick up debris from the surface, which spells bad news for your shield. When hit by debris, your shield will glitch and degrade, both making you more visible to other raiders and lowering your chances of surviving many gunfights. It seems that when navigating the Hurricanes, it might be best to take off your shield, though you’ll be far more susceptible to a raider ambush.

Visibility

Clouds hang low during the Hurricanes, making topside almost unrecognisable. Vision will be limited, as will be your hearing, thanks to the howls of the winds. However, it doesn’t have to be all bad news, as you’re more than welcome to use it to your advantage too—just don’t walk headfirst into an obscured ARC.

First Wave Caches

Everyone’s always on the lookout for loot in ARC Raiders, and it looks like the Hurricanes will unearth some forgotten treasures. First Wave Caches can be found during the Hurricanes, as these First Wave relics have resurfaced due to the powerful winds. It seems like good loot can be found in these, so it might be worth weathering the storm after all.

Are you excited to try out the new ARC Raiders Hurricane Map Condition? Let your voice be heard in the official Insider Gaming Discord Server.

For more ARC Raiders content, check out the Expedition 2 release date and requirements, as well as 7 secret loot spots you need to know.

item.title: Capcom Promises ‘Firm Action’ Over Resident Evil Requiem Leaks
item.content:encoded:
Resident Evil Requiem copies are in the wild, and Capcom has now promised to take action against the people posting any gameplay videos.

Capcom’s Resident Evil Requiem is one of the developer’s biggest releases of the year, and they are committed to preserving the experience for fans. While leaks prior to official reveals and announcements typically reveal only limited details about the game, the physical copies being shared earlier are spoiling content for players.

Resident Evil Requiem Spoilers Are Already Online

Capcom released a new statement on the BIO_OFFICIAL X account (formerly Twitter) regarding actions against individuals who spoil content from Resident Evil Requiem. The developers acknowledged that a significant number of gameplay videos have surfaced, which they believe were obtained illegally. They have requested that players who have access to the content or the game refrain from posting it online.

The developers have stated that posting these videos is not only a copyright infringement but also an offense against their customers. As a result, they will take firm action, such as deleting these videos and issuing warnings to users who engage in this activity. The developers aim to deliver a story that intertwines mystery and tension, providing a thrilling gaming experience that challenges players with unknown threats. They don’t want this experience to be spoiled for their audience.

In other news, check out the Resident Evil Requiem release date countdown and exact start times. Additionally, here is the game’s complete Trophy and Achievement list. What are your thoughts on Capcom taking firm action over Resident Evil Requiem leaks? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Pokemon Fire Red and Leaf Green are coming to Switch next week. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Today’s Quordle #1488: All Answers & Hints For February 20, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Quordle takes the complexity of the original daily word game and ups the ante by having you solve four solutions at once. Your 100% attention suddenly needs to be diverted four ways, and completing the daily Quordle is tough without the right starting words or hints. February 20, 2026, Quordle is the #1488 edition of the puzzle, and there are four new words for you to find. This guide has hints and a helping hand to help you solve all four words.

Before the information comes thick and fast at you, make sure you give today’s Quordle a go if you haven’t already!

How To Play Quordle Daily Word Game

Quordle is different from other daily word games as it requires you to correctly work out four words at once, and you can attempt this through the official Quordle website.

Before anything else, check out this set of instructions on finding and playing Quordle:

  1. Go to the Quordle website.
  2. You should be presented with four equal boxes reminiscent of a Wordle setup.
  3. Enter your first guess using the keyboard input at the bottom of the screen.
  4. The game will fill out the first of nine lines for all four boxes.
  5. A green box means the letter is correct AND goes in that exact spot on the grid.
  6. A yellow box means the letter is correct BUT needs to go in a different spot on the grid.
  7. A grey box means the letter DOESN’T feature at all.
  8. Do this up to nine times to try to solve all four words.

Best Quordle Tips & Tricks

  • Try to use as many of the five vowels as you can in your first two guesses.
  • Focus on solving words with more green and yellow boxes first.
  • Avoid reusing letters that are not applicable across any of the four answers.
  • Don’t be afraid to try the same letter twice in one word, as answers can be sneaky like that.
  • Play the Practice game first if you’re not used to Quordle, or need a warm-up before today’s new game!

Quordle Hints For Today, February 20, 2026

Top-left grid

  • Hint 1: Type of pants and shorts.
  • Hint 2: A vehicle’s haul.

Top-right grid

  • Hint 1: Impure.
  • Hint 2: To not play nice.

Bottom-left grid

  • Hint 1: Type of pepper (American spelling).
  • Hint 2: Hot food (American spelling).

Bottom-right grid

  • Hint 1: Chinese crime organisation.
  • Hint 2: A trinity.

Starter Words For February 20, 2026 Quordle

You should consider using one or more of the following words to get you started with today’s new Quordle puzzle:

  • Brine
  • Print
  • Slick

SPOILER WARNING: The answers will be revealed next!

All Today’s Quordle #1488 Answers For February 20, 2026

Get ready for all four of today’s Quordle answers, starting from the top-left grid, then the top-right, then the bottom-left, and finally the bottom-right.

When Is The Next Quordle Daily Game?

Quordle is updated daily at 12 AM (Midnight) in your time zone and region, so the next game will start on February 20.

The Quordle schedule is very consistent and always comes out at the same time each new day.

What Is Quordle?

Quordle is a variation of the popular Wordle daily word game, but instead of giving you one word to solve, you must figure out four unique words at the same time.

Needless to say, Quordle is MUCH harder than Wordle! There are days when it might be an achievement just to solve one of the four words. Whereas you can guess Wordle with your first answer, that’s impossible with Quordle. You need to be thinking on all cylinders with Quordle, and Insider Gaming strongly recommends you take the hints above on board and apply them to future Quordle puzzles.

Additionally, a new daily guide will be on the website for every new puzzle. Keep coming back each day for hints and solutions to the newest Quordle daily word games!

How did you find today’s Quordle? If you have any feedback on what you want to see added to these guides, share your thoughts via the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord Server.

You should also check out IG’s other word game guides:

  • Today’s Contexto #1251: Hints & Answer For February 20, 2026
  • Wordscapes Daily Puzzle Hints Today—Answers For Friday, February 20
  • NYT Mini Crossword Hints Today—Answers For Friday, February 20
  • NYT Connections Hints Today (#985)—Answers for Friday, February 20

item.title: Today’s Contexto #1251: Hints & Answer For February 20, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Contexto is a word association game that gives you a new word to guess every single day. With every attempt, the AI algorithm determines how close your guess is to the daily answer based on thematic and contextual similarity.

Sometimes, though, no matter how experienced you are, the word you’re looking for can be incredibly vague and hard to deduce. Luckily for you, this guide is full of hints to give you a helping hand, but make sure you give today’s Contexto a go if you haven’t already!

How To Play Contexto

Contexto is incredibly simple to play, but difficult to master. All you have to do is type words into the search bar, and the AI algorithm will tell you how close your word is to the answer.

You’ll know how close your guess is based on the colour of the bar and the number next to it.

  • Red includes guesses with the number 1,501 and above, meaning you’re way off from the secret word.
  • Orange includes guesses between 301 and 1,500, meaning you’re getting closer, but still some ways off.
  • Green includes guesses between 1 and 300, meaning you’re on the right track.

Best Contexto Tips & Tricks

  • Start off using broad terms, then narrow down once you’ve got under the 1,000 mark.
  • Try using Nouns first, and dip into verbs or adjectives once you’ve discovered the context.
  • Experiment with random words at times, especially as different forms of a root word can rank differently, such as work and worker.
  • Guess away, as unlike other word games like Wordle, you aren’t limited to a strict number of attempts.

Best Starting Words For Contexto

Here are some great starting words to get you going with Contexto:

  • Thing
  • Person
  • Place
  • Animal
  • Work
  • Nature
  • Game
  • Concept
  • Idea
  • Food

Contexto Hints For Today, February 20, 2026

Without giving away today’s Contexto answer, here are a few helpful hints to get you thinking in the right direction:

  • Hint 1: Found underground
  • Hint 2: Used in jewellery
  • Hint 3: Multi-coloured gemstone

If they don’t help, then here are the nine closest words, going from tenth to second:

  • Onyx
  • Sapphire
  • Agate
  • Aquamarine
  • Garnet
  • Topaz
  • Peridot
  • Gemstone
  • Amethyst

Today’s Contexto Answer For Game #1251 On February 20, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, and still can’t figure out today’s Contexto answer, then you can find it down below:

Answer: Opal

An opal is a precious stone whose colour changes when the position of the person looking at it changes.

When Is The Next Contexto Game After #1251?

Contexto is updated daily at 12 AM or Midnight in your respective time zone, meaning the next game will start on February 21

The Contexto schedule is very consistent, with a new game releasing at the same time every day.

How did you find today’s Contexto? Share your thoughts in the official Insider Gaming Discord Server.

For more daily guides, check out IG’s other word game guides:

  • NYT Connections
  • NYT Mini Crossword
  • Wordscapes

item.title: Wordscapes Daily Puzzle Hints Today—Answers For Friday, February 20
item.content:encoded:
Wordscapes is a popular word game where players solve a crossword using anagrams, and it also features a Daily Puzzle, which is not the easiest to solve at times.

If you are one of the players who is struggling with the latest Wordscapes Daily Puzzle, then don’t worry, as Insider Gaming has all the hints and answers for the puzzle featured on Friday, February 20.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s edition of the Wordscapes Daily Puzzle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How to Play Wordscapes

Wordscapes is a relatively easy game to play, but it can become increasingly challenging as you advance. In the game, players are presented with a crossword puzzle to solve using an anagram. The anagram is displayed below the crossword, and players must swipe across the letters to form words.

The game features over 6,000 crossword puzzles for players to solve. More points can be unlocked by finding hidden words, and each level also comes with a beautiful landscape background. The game is available for free download on both the Google Play Store and the iOS App Store.

Wordscapes Daily Puzzle Clues (Feb. 20)

Here are hints for all the Wordscapes Daily Puzzle answers for February 20, 2026, to make your puzzle a bit easier.

Across

  1. To have some affliction in the mind or body.
  2. A system of transport that uses trains.
  3. A mixture of gases that surrounds the Earth.
  4. Word for the number 0.
  5. A metal container for holding liquid.
  6. A vehicle that travels on a road and has 4 wheels.
  7. Water falling from the sky.
  8. ______ desire.
  9. Connected to people’s race.

Down

  1. Related to the skull.
  2. Something you hammer into a wall.
  3. A large group of families related through a common ancestor.
  4. A curved line, part of a circle.
  5. The past tense of moving rapidly on your feet.
  6. One that does not tell the truth.
  7. The past participle of lie.
  8. A cut made in land for boats and ships to travel.
  9. Resting space of a wild animal.

All Wordscapes Daily Puzzle Answers (Feb. 20)

Here are all the answers for Wordscapes Daily Puzzle on February 20, 2026, if the hints were not enough for you.

Across

  1. AIL
  2. RAIL 
  3. AIR
  4. NIL
  5. CAN 
  6. CAR
  7. RAIN
  8. CARNAL
  9. RACIAL 

Down

  1. CRANIAL 
  2. NAIL
  3. CLAN
  4. ARC
  5. RAN 
  6. ALIAR
  7. LAIN
  8. CANAL 
  9. LAIR 

When is the Next Wordscapes Daily Puzzle?

The next daily puzzle will be updated at 12 AM local time, with the next, for February 21, arriving tomorrow.

What are your thoughts on today’s Wordscapes Daily Puzzle? Did you find it difficult or easy? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more word games, check out hints and answers for today’s NYT Connections, and take a look at hints for today’s NYT Mini.

item.title: NYT Mini Crossword Hints Today—Answers For Friday, February 19
item.content:encoded:
The NYT Mini Crossword is a popular, quick-to-complete word game to test yourself daily, but some of the puzzles can be difficult to complete.

If you’ve found yourself stuck on today’s NYT Mini, Insider Gaming has some helpful hints and all the answers for the NYT Mini Crossword on February 20, 2026.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s edition of the NYT Mini Crossword. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How to Play NYT Mini Crossword

The NYT Mini Crossword is available to play on the New York Times Games app or website, but, as of September 2025, a New York Times Game subscription is required.

The NYT Games Subscription is priced at $6.95 per month, but there are introductory offers available for other NYT subscriptions that include games access, which might be worth considering.

Without a Games subscription, access to the NYT Mini Crossword is blocked.

NYT Mini Crossword Clues (Feb. 20)

Here are all the clues provided for the NYT Mini Crossword for February 20, 2026.

Across

1 – Political party that competed with Democrats during the 1830s-’50s

6 – Four Seasons, e.g.

7 – Dinosaur in the Mario games

8 – Blizzard or hurricane

9 – We all look up to it

Down

1 – “Oh yeah, ___ that?”

2 – Says “who”?

3 – “No worries”

4 – Postmodern architect Frank

5 – Narrow

Additional Clues For NYT Mini (Feb. 20)

Here are some additional clues to help you solve the NYT Mini Crossword on February 20, 2026.

Across

1 – Predecessor to the Liberal Party

6 – Residence during a holiday

7 – Super Mario 2: ____’s Island

8 – Halle Berry’s character in the X-Men Fox movies

9 – Where clouds are found

Down

1 – Plural, BBC doctor, uses a Tardis to travel

2 – Noise owls make

3 – Hakuna Matata

4 – Designed the Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao

5 – Eminem moniker, ___ Shady

All NYT Mini Crossword Answers (Feb. 20)

Across

1 – WHIGS

6 – HOTEL

7 – YOSHI

8 – Storm

9 – SKY

Down

1 – WHYS

2 – HOOTS

3 – ITSOK

4 – GEHRY

5 – SLIM

When is The Next Game?

The NYT Mini Crossword refreshes daily at 10 PM ET on weekdays and Saturdays, and at 6 PM ET on Sundays.

As such, the next NYT Mini Crossword will be available at 7 PM PT/9 PM CT/10 PM ET/3 AM GMT/2 PM AET.

What is The NYT Mini Crossword?

The NYT Mini Crossword was introduced in 2014 as a shorter and quicker-to-complete game to accompany the main New York Times Crossword, which was initially released in 1942.

Until September 2025, the NYT Mini Crossword was free, but it has now been consolidated into a monthly NYT Games Subscription alongside several other popular games.

Did you struggle with the NYT Mini Crossword today? Share your thoughts in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more word games, check out today’s NYT Connections hints, and take a look at yesterday’s Wordscapes puzzle hints.

item.title: Pokémon Presents 2026 Arrives Next Week
item.content:encoded:
The date and time for Pokémon Presents 2026 have been revealed: it will air on February 27, 2026.

Pokémon Presents 2026 is an event fans of the franchise have been eagerly waiting for, as it will make all announcements about future games and other media properties they are working on. What’s more, the event falls on Pokémon Day 2026, and this year is the 30th anniversary of the franchise.

Pokémon Presents 2026 Airs on February 27

Announced through the official Pokémon X account (formerly Twitter), Pokémon Presents 2026 will be hosted on February 27 at 6:00 AM PST. The event will feature announcements about everything new coming out of the franchise. Interested readers will be able to watch the event live by tuning into ‘The Official Pokémon YouTube channel‘. Hopefully, they have something special in store for us, given it’s the 30th Anniversary.

What to Expect from Pokémon Presents 2026

No official details about what Pokémon Presents 2026 will include have been revealed, so this is just speculation and based on previous rumours. Firstly, there has been a lot of talk about the Gen 10 game, and hopefully, it will finally be revealed at this event. Moreover, we could get announcements for a new game, a DLC, an update to an existing game, a live-action movie (maybe Detective Pikachu 2), or something in the anime industry. In the end, players will have to wait for an official announcement for sure.

In other news, Pokémon Fire Red and Leaf Green will be available to purchase for the Switch right after Pokémon Presents 2026. Additionally, the developers of Pokémon TCG Pocket have informed Insider Gaming that there are currently no plans to turn it into a competitive game; it will continue to function as a side event at tournaments. 

Will you be tuning in for Pokémon Presents 2026? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about WWE filing for a new ‘WWE Eras Collide’ gaming trademark. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
